OOC: Sorry I tried 2 questions
1)How do you die in this game nobody has any HP or Damage counters?
2)If this is Legal and if SnowCat's spark has not left her body I could put 
her in Lilly body but if your going to throw that body away I won't waste my 
time doing it! There is a downside I'll explain later.
My hotmail is really slow.

::Koj::

Lands by the gathering maximals "So your Spears the lady all this was 
about?" Koj looks spears up and down "Feh I'm not Impressed!" as he puts the 
lance away.

::Inu-Yasha::

Inu lands behind Koj "What my friend means is your the lady we were here to 
save its a honor to meet you?" As Inu taps Koj shoulder and point to the 
other have of prebon's blade sticking out his back

::Koj::
Looks at Inu "Where do you get that from I say what I mean when?"  As he 
reach around and pulls it out not to focused on the leaking wound throws it 
to the ground. "I suggest we gather the wounded the dead and the dying 
before they return."
